text: Ara kona loka emana'o rayeche yara an'yan'yake allahara samakaksa sabyasta kare ebam tadera prati temani bhalabasa posana kare, yemana allahara prati bhalabasa haye thake. Kintu yara allahara prati imanadara tadera bhalabasa odera tulanaya bahuguna besi. Ara kata'ina uttama haâ€™ta yadi e jalemara parthiba kona kona ayaba pratyaksa kare'i upalabdhi kare nita ye, yabatiya ksamata sudhumatra allahara'i jan'ya ebam allahara ayaba'i sabaceye kathinatara.
